## IMathMatrix.DeleteRow method

删除指定行

```csharp
public void DeleteRow(int rowIndex)
```

| 范围 | 类型 | 描述 |
| --- | --- | --- |
| rowIndex | Int32 | 要删除的行的从零开始的索引。 |

### 例子

示例：

```csharp
[C#]
IMathMatrix matrix = new MathMatrix(2, 3);
matrix.DeleteRow(0);
```
